{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Graphics Designer",
  "description": "GTI Investment is your trusted partner in investment banking services. Our broad range of service offerings includes Securities Dealing, Asset Management, Trusteeship, Corporate Finance, Private Equity, and Micro Banking. Since 1998, we have actively supported our highly diversified client base - Corporations, Financial Institutions, Governments, and Individuals - in securing a financially stable future.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer
Job Location:&nbsp;Marina, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Graphics Designer to join our team at a leading investment bank.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for translating complex financial concepts into visually compelling designs that align with our brand identity.
	You will support marketing, business development, and internal communication efforts by creating high-quality graphics that reflect the bank&rsquo;s professionalism and innovation.


Responsibilities


	Design and produce digital and print materials including presentations, reports, brochures, social media content, infographics, and advertisements.
	Work closely with investment, strategy, and business development teams to develop visual storytelling for proposals and client materials.
	Ensure all designs are aligned with brand guidelines and maintain consistency across all touchpoints.
	Create visuals for internal campaigns, newsletters, and events.
	Collaborate with external vendors (e.g., printers) to ensure high-quality output.
	Manage multiple design projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
	Stay updated on design trends and recommend innovations to elevate brand presence.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Method of Aplication
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;career@gti.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-08-28",

    "@type": "Organization",

  },

Graphics Designer Job at GTI Investment




        
    

        
        GTI Investment is your trusted partner in investment banking services. Our broad range of service offerings includes Securities Dealing, Asset Management, Trusteeship, Corporate Finance, Private Equity, and Micro Banking. Since 1998, we have actively supported our highly diversified client base - Corporations, Financial Institutions, Governments, and Individuals - in securing a financially stable future.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer
Job Location: Marina, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Graphics Designer to join our team at a leading investment bank.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for translating complex financial concepts into visually compelling designs that align with our brand identity.
	You will support marketing, business development, and internal communication efforts by creating high-quality graphics that reflect the bank’s professionalism and innovation.


Responsibilities


	Design and produce digital and print materials including presentations, reports, brochures, social media content, infographics, and advertisements.
	Work closely with investment, strategy, and business development teams to develop visual storytelling for proposals and client materials.
	Ensure all designs are aligned with brand guidelines and maintain consistency across all touchpoints.
	Create visuals for internal campaigns, newsletters, and events.
	Collaborate with external vendors (e.g., printers) to ensure high-quality output.
	Manage multiple design projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
	Stay updated on design trends and recommend innovations to elevate brand presence.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Method of Aplication
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@gti.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Managing Director / Chief Executive Officer",
  "description": "Umunnachi Microfinance Bank Limited is a well established, innovative and fast growing Microfinance Bank in Abakaliki, Ebonyi State.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managing Director / Chief Executive Officer

Job Location: Abakaliki, Ebonyi&nbsp;
Industry: Microfinance Banking Services Sub-sector

Description


	We wishe to engage the services of a well to do goal getter, efficient, result oriented record breaker per excellence Managing Director/Chief Executive Officer, to drive the strategic growth and operational effectiveness of the bank for utmost results under the following details.


Key Responsibilties


	Provision of strategic leadership to enhance business expansion, profitability, growth and sustainability.
	Oversee the day to day management of banking operations and ensuring compliance with regulatory guidelines.
	Foster and maintain strong relationship with key stakeholders, including regulatory bodies, investors, customers, community leaders etc.
	Lead the bank&#39;s innovation in the contemporary global dynamic microfinance sector and financial services dynamism to ensure continuous improvement in product offerings, acceptability and goal attainment.
	Development and implementation of policies that enhance financial inclusion and customer satisfaction.
	Ensure that bank&#39;s risk management framework aligns with industry best practices.


Minimum Requirements
The applicants to be considered for interview must have:


	A minimum of First Degree or its equivalent in Finance or related Business discipline (additional qualifications or Degree in any Finance or related Business discipline will be an added advantage).
	Minimum of Eight (8) years post qualification experience out of which at least Five (5) must be in the financial services industry and at least Three (3) at a senior management level.
	Evidence of in-depth knowledge and proven skills in Microfinance Banking and must have undergone the Microfinance Certification Programme and obtained a certificate from the Chartered Institute of Bankers (CIBN) as a Microfinance Banker.
	He/she must not be more than Sixty (60) years of age and must be physically, mentally and emotionally stable.
	Possession of proven character and without any litigation in previous place(s) of work and not to have been involved in fraudulent practices or dismissed from previous employment.
	Must be computer literate.
	Evidence of having held a position in the National Association of Microfinance Banks (NAMB) at national, zonal or state level will be an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their curriculum vitae (CV) to:&nbsp;info@umunnachimfb.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: All interested applicants are expected to write his/her vision for the bank in not more than half page (12 points Times New Roman).",

  "validThrough": "2025-08-21",

Managing Director / Chief Executive Officer Job at Umunnachi Microfinance Bank Limited




        
    

        
        Umunnachi Microfinance Bank Limited is a well established, innovative and fast growing Microfinance Bank in Abakaliki, Ebonyi State.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managing Director / Chief Executive Officer

Job Location: Abakaliki, Ebonyi 
Industry: Microfinance Banking Services Sub-sector

Description
     

            
    




	We wishe to engage the services of a well to do goal getter, efficient, result oriented record breaker per excellence Managing Director/Chief Executive Officer, to drive the strategic growth and operational effectiveness of the bank for utmost results under the following details.


Key Responsibilties


	Provision of strategic leadership to enhance business expansion, profitability, growth and sustainability.
	Oversee the day to day management of banking operations and ensuring compliance with regulatory guidelines.
	Foster and maintain strong relationship with key stakeholders, including regulatory bodies, investors, customers, community leaders etc.
	Lead the bank's innovation in the contemporary global dynamic microfinance sector and financial services dynamism to ensure continuous improvement in product offerings, acceptability and goal attainment.
	Development and implementation of policies that enhance financial inclusion and customer satisfaction.
	Ensure that bank's risk management framework aligns with industry best practices.


Minimum Requirements
The applicants to be considered for interview must have:


	A minimum of First Degree or its equivalent in Finance or related Business discipline (additional qualifications or Degree in any Finance or related Business discipline will be an added advantage).
	Minimum of Eight (8) years post qualification experience out of which at least Five (5) must be in the financial services industry and at least Three (3) at a senior management level.
	Evidence of in-depth knowledge and proven skills in Microfinance Banking and must have undergone the Microfinance Certification Programme and obtained a certificate from the Chartered Institute of Bankers (CIBN) as a Microfinance Banker.
	He/she must not be more than Sixty (60) years of age and must be physically, mentally and emotionally stable.
	Possession of proven character and without any litigation in previous place(s) of work and not to have been involved in fraudulent practices or dismissed from previous employment.
	Must be computer literate.
	Evidence of having held a position in the National Association of Microfinance Banks (NAMB) at national, zonal or state level will be an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their curriculum vitae (CV) to: info@umunnachimfb.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: All interested applicants are expected to write his/her vision for the bank in not more than half page (12 points Times New Roman).    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "IT Administrator",
  "description": "Skyline International Tourism and Hospitality Limited (SITH) was established in 2019 as the hospitality division of the Skyline Group in Nigeria. SITH is the franchisee for Pizza Hut in Nigeria (all regions except Lagos). Pizza Hut is part of Yum Brands (formerly PepsiCo Restaurants). Skyline International Tourism and Hospitality is the&nbsp;fastest-growing F&amp;B company in Nigeria.

StrEat Caf&eacute; is a brand curated by the team at Skyline International Tourism &amp; Hospitality Ltd. StrEat caf&eacute; is an amalgamation of food and beverages from various parts of the world, served in a charming and relaxed ambience. To top it off, we have carefully crafted M&ouml;venpick Ice Cream with the Alpine Spirit. The way we take care of our cows Matilda, Sophie and Candy, the one that inspires us to passionately pick the right natural ingredients to craft every M&ouml;venpick Ice Cream.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Administrator

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	System Management:&nbsp;Overseeing the performance, maintenance, and security of servers, networks, and other IT infrastructure.
	User Management:&nbsp;Creating and managing user accounts, assigning permissions, and handling access control for employees.
	Troubleshooting:&nbsp;Diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and network issues reported by users or identified through monitoring.
	Software and Hardware Management:&nbsp;Installing, configuring, and updating software, operating systems, and hardware components.
	Security Management:&nbsp;Implementing and maintaining security measures such as firewalls, antivirus software, and access controls to protect the organization&#39;s data and systems.
	Backup and Recovery:&nbsp;Implementing and managing backup and disaster recovery solutions to ensure data integrity and business continuity.
	Monitoring and Maintenance:&nbsp;Monitoring system performance, security logs, and network activity to identify potential issues and proactively address them.
	Documentation:&nbsp;Creating and maintaining documentation for IT systems, procedures, and user guides.


Skills and Qualifications


	Relevant Education: A Degree or Diploma in Computer Science, IT, or a related field is often required.
	Technical Proficiency: Strong understanding of computer hardware, software, networking, and security principles.
	Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues efficiently.
	Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to interact with users, vendors, and other IT professionals.
	Organizational Skills: Ability to manage multiple tasks, prioritize work, and meet deadlines.
	Customer Service Skills: Ability to provide effective and courteous technical support to end-users.
	Be professional
	Be discreet.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;bookrichy@outlook.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

IT Administrator Job at Skyline International Tourism & Hospitality Limited




        
    

        
        Skyline International Tourism and Hospitality Limited (SITH) was established in 2019 as the hospitality division of the Skyline Group in Nigeria. SITH is the franchisee for Pizza Hut in Nigeria (all regions except Lagos). Pizza Hut is part of Yum Brands (formerly PepsiCo Restaurants). Skyline International Tourism and Hospitality is the fastest-growing F&B company in Nigeria.
     

            
    



StrEat Café is a brand curated by the team at Skyline International Tourism & Hospitality Ltd. StrEat café is an amalgamation of food and beverages from various parts of the world, served in a charming and relaxed ambience. To top it off, we have carefully crafted Mövenpick Ice Cream with the Alpine Spirit. The way we take care of our cows Matilda, Sophie and Candy, the one that inspires us to passionately pick the right natural ingredients to craft every Mövenpick Ice Cream.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Administrator

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	System Management: Overseeing the performance, maintenance, and security of servers, networks, and other IT infrastructure.
	User Management: Creating and managing user accounts, assigning permissions, and handling access control for employees.
	Troubleshooting: Diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and network issues reported by users or identified through monitoring.
	Software and Hardware Management: Installing, configuring, and updating software, operating systems, and hardware components.
	Security Management: Implementing and maintaining security measures such as firewalls, antivirus software, and access controls to protect the organization's data and systems.
	Backup and Recovery: Implementing and managing backup and disaster recovery solutions to ensure data integrity and business continuity.
	Monitoring and Maintenance: Monitoring system performance, security logs, and network activity to identify potential issues and proactively address them.
	Documentation: Creating and maintaining documentation for IT systems, procedures, and user guides.


Skills and Qualifications


	Relevant Education: A Degree or Diploma in Computer Science, IT, or a related field is often required.
	Technical Proficiency: Strong understanding of computer hardware, software, networking, and security principles.
	Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues efficiently.
	Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to interact with users, vendors, and other IT professionals.
	Organizational Skills: Ability to manage multiple tasks, prioritize work, and meet deadlines.
	Customer Service Skills: Ability to provide effective and courteous technical support to end-users.
	Be professional
	Be discreet.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: bookrichy@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Structural Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full Time

Job Description


	Natony Limited is recruiting a highly skilled Structural Designer on behalf of Chevron Nigeria Limited (CNL).
	This role demands expertise in oil &amp; gas (onshore/offshore) facilities, proficiency in 3D modeling (E3D, PDMS, Tekla), and a strong background in EPIC project execution.


Key Requirements


	HND/Degree in Civil/Structural Engineering.
	5+ years in oil &amp; gas structural design.
	Brownfield/Greenfield experience.
	Mastery of AutoCAD, Bentley ProStructures, and international standards (API, ASME, ISO).


Method of Application

Structural Designer Job at Natony Limited




        
    

        
        Natony Limited RC.105963 is a Nigerian Contracting Company Engaged in Civil, Mechanical Fabrications and Installation, Electrical and Instrumentation, Diving / Remote Operated Vehicles (ROV) Operations, Corrosion Control, Pipe lines Construction/ Installations, Subsea Surveys/ Inspection Maintenance Salvage, Operation and Maintenance of Oil and Gas Facility.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Structural Designer

Job Location: Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full Time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Natony Limited is recruiting a highly skilled Structural Designer on behalf of Chevron Nigeria Limited (CNL).
	This role demands expertise in oil & gas (onshore/offshore) facilities, proficiency in 3D modeling (E3D, PDMS, Tekla), and a strong background in EPIC project execution.


Key Requirements


	HND/Degree in Civil/Structural Engineering.
	5+ years in oil & gas structural design.
	Brownfield/Greenfield experience.
	Mastery of AutoCAD, Bentley ProStructures, and international standards (API, ASME, ISO).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@natonyltd.com CC: monyei.paul@natonyltd.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Marketing Manager",
  "description": "SecureHub Connect is Nigeria&rsquo;s game-changing, mobile-first platform that&rsquo;s transforming the gig economy. We connect businesses with a dynamic, underutilized workforce, making flexible staffing faster, simpler, and more reliable.We bridge the gap between employers and talent in key urban centers, powering short-term, shift-based roles in Hospitality, Industrial &amp; Warehousing, Facilities Management, Business Support, and Retail.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Ready to help build Nigeria&rsquo;s #1 platform for flexible work?
	SecureHub Connect is on the hunt for a creative, results-driven, and passionate Marketing Manager to help supercharge our growth.
	Based in Ibadan with a full-time work arrangement, this permanent role is perfect for someone who wants to make a real impact, drive user adoption, and shape the future of work for thousands of Nigerians.
	As our Marketing Manager, you&rsquo;ll bring our brand to life through campaigns that attract both employers needing reliable staff and workers looking for income opportunities.


Responsibilities


	Design and execute bold, multi-channel marketing strategies that grow both sides of our marketplace.
	Build eye-catching social media campaigns that turn heads and drive action.
	Craft messaging that speaks directly to students, job seekers, and businesses.
	Launch on-campus activations, influencer partnerships, and local events to keep SHUB Connect top of mind.
	Oversee lead generation and conversion funnels to drive sign-ups and app downloads.
	Manage and grow our vibrant social media communities.
	Secure partnership opportunities with universities, businesses, and youth communities.
	Stay plugged in to the latest gig economy and marketing trends, and always be innovating.
	Analyze data like a pro, learn what works, and make it even better.
	Engage extensively with Sales and Operations teams to ensure one clear, unified message.
	Create marketing materials that sell our vision: presentations, flyers, social ads, and more.
	Support employer outreach campaigns to build trust and drive demand.
	Plan and execute local events or webinars to strengthen community engagement.


Qualifications
Basic Qualifications:


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree or Higher qualification in Marketing or a relevant field
	5+ years in marketing, digital marketing, growth marketing, or brand management.
	Excellent communicator with strong writing and verbal skills in the English Language.
	Proven ability to run effective social media campaigns.
	Comfortable using data to make smart marketing decisions.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Experience in marketing to youth, students, and entry-level job seekers.
	Background in recruitment, HR tech, or gig work platforms.
	Familiarity with marketing automation tools and CRMs.
	Ability to juggle multiple campaigns without dropping the ball.
	Self-starter who thrives in a dynamic environment.
	A track record of hitting growth goals or lead targets.
	Deep understanding of Nigeria&rsquo;s employment landscape and local culture.
	Ability to work under minimal or zero supervision.


Suggested Skills:


	Digital Advertising (Facebook/Google Ads)
	Content Creation &amp; Copywriting
	Graphic Designing
	Social Media Management
	Data-Driven Decision Making
	Community Building
	Relationship Management
	Campaign Planning &amp; Execution.


You&rsquo;ll join a team that is:


	Bold and innovative
	Driven by impact
	Focused on real growth for real people.


Salary
N52,650 - N81,800 monthly.

Note


	Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and should you qualify for the role, a member of our team would reach out to you to advise the next step.
	The ideal candidate must have prior experience in the Marketing field with an evidence track record, must live in Ibadan or willing to relocate and can report to the head office at least Monday - Friday.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-08-06",
  "validThrough": "2025-09-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "SecureHub Connect"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",

Marketing Manager Job at SecureHub Connect




        
    

        
        SecureHub Connect is Nigeria’s game-changing, mobile-first platform that’s transforming the gig economy. We connect businesses with a dynamic, underutilized workforce, making flexible staffing faster, simpler, and more reliable.We bridge the gap between employers and talent in key urban centers, powering short-term, shift-based roles in Hospitality, Industrial & Warehousing, Facilities Management, Business Support, and Retail.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Manager

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Ready to help build Nigeria’s #1 platform for flexible work?
	SecureHub Connect is on the hunt for a creative, results-driven, and passionate Marketing Manager to help supercharge our growth.
	Based in Ibadan with a full-time work arrangement, this permanent role is perfect for someone who wants to make a real impact, drive user adoption, and shape the future of work for thousands of Nigerians.
	As our Marketing Manager, you’ll bring our brand to life through campaigns that attract both employers needing reliable staff and workers looking for income opportunities.


Responsibilities


	Design and execute bold, multi-channel marketing strategies that grow both sides of our marketplace.
	Build eye-catching social media campaigns that turn heads and drive action.
	Craft messaging that speaks directly to students, job seekers, and businesses.
	Launch on-campus activations, influencer partnerships, and local events to keep SHUB Connect top of mind.
	Oversee lead generation and conversion funnels to drive sign-ups and app downloads.
	Manage and grow our vibrant social media communities.
	Secure partnership opportunities with universities, businesses, and youth communities.
	Stay plugged in to the latest gig economy and marketing trends, and always be innovating.
	Analyze data like a pro, learn what works, and make it even better.
	Engage extensively with Sales and Operations teams to ensure one clear, unified message.
	Create marketing materials that sell our vision: presentations, flyers, social ads, and more.
	Support employer outreach campaigns to build trust and drive demand.
	Plan and execute local events or webinars to strengthen community engagement.


Qualifications
Basic Qualifications:


	Bachelor's Degree or Higher qualification in Marketing or a relevant field
	5+ years in marketing, digital marketing, growth marketing, or brand management.
	Excellent communicator with strong writing and verbal skills in the English Language.
	Proven ability to run effective social media campaigns.
	Comfortable using data to make smart marketing decisions.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Experience in marketing to youth, students, and entry-level job seekers.
	Background in recruitment, HR tech, or gig work platforms.
	Familiarity with marketing automation tools and CRMs.
	Ability to juggle multiple campaigns without dropping the ball.
	Self-starter who thrives in a dynamic environment.
	A track record of hitting growth goals or lead targets.
	Deep understanding of Nigeria’s employment landscape and local culture.
	Ability to work under minimal or zero supervision.


Suggested Skills:


	Digital Advertising (Facebook/Google Ads)
	Content Creation & Copywriting
	Graphic Designing
	Social Media Management
	Data-Driven Decision Making
	Community Building
	Relationship Management
	Campaign Planning & Execution.


You’ll join a team that is:


	Bold and innovative
	Driven by impact
	Focused on real growth for real people.


Salary
N52,650 - N81,800 monthly.

Note


	Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and should you qualify for the role, a member of our team would reach out to you to advise the next step.
	The ideal candidate must have prior experience in the Marketing field with an evidence track record, must live in Ibadan or willing to relocate and can report to the head office at least Monday - Friday.
